    • DiscountedModification

      public DiscountedModification(String name, int priorityValue, long cost, TypeOfModification typeOfModification)
      Constructs a new Modification.Automatically increments and calculates . Extend the parent invalid input: '{@' Modification}.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the modification
      priorityValue - the priority value (higher = more important)
      cost - the base cost of the modification
      typeOfModification - the type of modification, enum + int value (cannot be null)
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if name or typeOfModification is null, from the parent's constructor
